name: Church of Stratum (Prologue)
description:
Church of Stratum (Prologue) is a First-person Horror-like (No monsters, No jump scares, just spooky atmosphere) exploration game.

The end of times is upon us, we must cast aside this land and embrace the land of past times if we are to one day walk in god’s new world.

So goes the speech the Church of Stratum cult repeated every day, until they all suddenly vanished over 20 years ago.

But now by accident you have just discovered their now abandoned underground bunker, make your way through the dilapidated hallways and discover the mystery of what caused the death of the entire bunker.

Open doors by holding left click and dragging the mouse to move the door.

Most Objects can be picked up. If it has an outline when you look at it, hold the left mouse to pick it up and move it around. If you hold down R you can then rotate the object.

Inspired by Frictional Games Penumbra series and many other Walking sims, my goal with this game is to bring life back into this style of game. Give the player a rich story to learn but also a rich environment to explore, with puzzles and secrets hidden everywhere for players to find.

After exactly 8 months of development the Prologue is now available, if you enjoy it please consider supporting me, either by following development or donating. With your help I will be able to transform this short game into a full title.
